tool.name: Show-Coords

param.name: delta
param.label: Delta File from Nucmer or Promer

param.name: merge
param.label: Merge
param.help: Merges overlapping alignments regardless of match dir or frame and does not display any idenitity information.

param.name: percent_coverage
param.label: Include percent coverage information in the output

param.name: display
param.label: Display
param.help: Display the alignment direction in the additional FRM columns

param.name: header
param.label: Do not print the output header

param.name: identity
param.label: Set minimum percent identity to display

param.name: knockout
param.label: Knockout
param.help: Knockout (do not display) alignments that overlap another alignment in a different frame by more than 50% of their length, AND have a smaller percent similarity or are less than 75% of the size of the other alignment (promer only)

param.name: length_info
param.label: Include the sequence length information in the output

param.name: min_alignment_length
param.label: Set minimum alignment length to display

param.name: annotate
param.label: Annotate
param.help: Annotate maximal alignments between two sequences, i.e. overlaps between reference and query sequences

param.name: sort
param.label: Sorting strategy for output lines
param.option: Sort output lines by query IDs and coordinates
Sort output lines by reference IDs and coordinates

tool.help: This program parses the delta alignment output of nucmer and promer and displays the coordinates, and other useful information about the alignments.
